content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ it is no secret that i really like to push the envelope with stitches and designs especially colorwork designs and the desert cactus mosaic crochet blanket is no different i had so much fun while designing the desert cactus mosaic crochet blanket i included 2 options for the blanket border a mosaic crochet border and a simple border each section of the desert cactus mosaic crochet blanket is separated out to make the charts easy to follow don t worry if you don t like charts written instructions are also included a free version of the desert cactus mosaic blanket is available for free at https //brianakdesigns com/desert-cactus-mosaic-crochet-free-blanket-pattern/ **supplies** size h 5mm hook or hook to obtain gauge 1 removable stitch markers if needed 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 scissors 4 **yarn** lion brand color theory 5 100% acrylic 246 yds/100g mary maxim starlette worsted 6 100% acrylic 180 yds/100g total yds with mosaic border is 3 400 yds total yds with simple border is 2500 yds **skill level** intermediate **size** mosaic border - 43 wide by 61 long simple border - 41 wide by 56 long come and join the fun with the briana k community facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/brianak © 2022 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner 1 https //shrsl com/3vjm6 2 https //shrsl com/2boqv 3 https //shrsl com/2bor2 4 https //shrsl com/2cibs 5 https //shrsl com/3to3b 6 https //shrsl com/3cudn 7 https //brianakdesigns com/stacked-single-crochet/
